title: American Horror Story: Murder House
summary: American Horror Story: Murder House (originally titled American Horror Story) is the first season of the FX horror anthology television series American Horror Story, created by Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk. It aired between October 5 and December 21, 2011. The season was produced by 20th Century Fox Television, and the executive producers were Dante Di Loreto and series creators Murphy and Falchuk.
